body.title: TERMINAL AND GATE
body.heading: Terminal 1
body.text:
Gates B: 1-9

  • Fly By Checkin
  • Fly By Security
  • Express Bag Drop

body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Monday-Sunday

Opens 90 minutes before first departure

  • All bags must be checked 45 minutes prior to scheduled departure

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area:  Located at the east end of Terminal 1 & 2 and the south end of Terminal 3 by gate 520. All exits have signage

Learn more about Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood International Airport
